Document.p: Areas that have low tech windmill power are shown as dark green.
The areas within the main power grid are shown as light green.
The unpowerd areas are displayed as normal.
This button uses power. Try not to leave it turned on too long.

Left click on the mini screen to reposition the main window. Left click on the mini screen title to choose a different mini screen view. Toggle overlay mode by pressing 'v' or middle click on the mini screen title.
